mutants.code:
import re

def punctuate_numeral_words(s, l):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+[\\w{}]*\\b'.format(''.join([re.escape(c) for c in l])), s)
    numeral_words = [word for word in words if any((c.isdigit() for c in word)) or any((c in word for c in l))]
    return numeral_words

mutants.code:
import re

def punctuate_numeral_words(s, l):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+[\\w{}]*\\b'.format(''.join([re.escape(c) for c in l])), s)
    numeral_words = [word for word in words if any((c.isdigit() for c in word)) and any((c not in word for c in l))]
    return numeral_words
